text: Tera Patrick (born July 25, 1976) is a former American pornographic actress and adult model. Her real name is Linda Ann Hopkins. She has also used the aliases Tara Patrick, Sadie Jordan, Brooke Thomas and Tera Hopkins. Tera Patrick was born in Great Falls, Montana. She acted in about 120 adult movies. Patrick has been in Playboy and Penthouse. In Penthouse she was the "Pet of the Month" for February 2000. ==References== == Other websites == *Official website *Official film website *Movies with Tera Patrick Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Montana Category:American adult models Category:American pornographic actors Category:People from Great Falls, Montana Category:American bloggers Category:AVN Award winners
title: Tera Patrick
